content: औचित्यं, ओचिती [उचित-ष्यञ् यलोपे ङीष्] {@--1@} Aptness, fitness, propriety, suitableness. {@--2@} Congruity or fitness, as one of the several circumstances which determine the exact meaning of a word in a sentence (such as संयोग, वियोग &c.); सामर्थ्यमौचिती देशः कालो व्यक्तिः स्वरादयः <ls>S. D. 2</ls>; in the example पातु वो दयितामुखं there is औचिती or fitness in taking मुख to mean सांमुख्यं (meeting) instead of आननं. {@--3@} Habituation.
